titles: A prophesie of a countryman called Michel Lindeman, being 86 years of age, living in the dukedom of Hagen, done in the harvest-time of our Lord, 1699.
author: Lindeman, Michel, b. ca. 1613.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Europe --  Politics and government --  17th century --  Prophecies.
